snippet: Goldman Sachs reports first-quarter profit of $2.2 billion. | SoftBank strikes back after Dish Network made a rival bid for Sprint Nextel. | Energy Future Holdings has a plan to resolve its troubles, but creditors appear less than enthusiastic. |...
abstract: Goldman Sachs reports first-quarter profit of $2.2 billion. | SoftBank strikes back after Dish Network made a rival bid for Sprint Nextel. | Energy Future Holdings has a plan to resolve its troubles, but creditors appear less than enthusiastic. | Gold prices fell 9 percent on Monday, the steepest drop in 30 years.
